text: Feeling so tired and hopelessI m in my  s and have dealt with depression and anxiety since I was a teenager  Through all of those years  there have of course been times I felt ok and even happy  But it always comes back to feeling like this  Tired and overwhelmed and sick and numb  And if that s the case  then what s the point in living  I feel like I will never truly escape this feeling    I m in my  s and have done very little with my life  I m a college drop out  no career  a job that feels like it s slowly sucking the soul out of my body every day  no friends  a girl who says she s in love with me but will probably never actually be with me  I know there are things I could do to improve certain aspects of my life but it seems very overwhelming and I also just don t care anymore   Through all of my years dealing with depression  I had never really felt suicidal  But that changes in the last   or so years  I feel like my limited coping mechanisms are fucking shot at this point  I think about dying on a daily basis  The only things stopping me are fear of failing at it and feeling even fucking worse and my mom  I know she d never recover if I killed myself  I ve also just never been able to decide how I d do it   Tonight I tried texting that   line I ve never called or texted anything like that   I almost immediately got over it  They were nice  but the generic responses weren t what I needed to hear tonight   I don t really know why I m posting this  I m just so sick of feeling like this  but I feel like it s all I know  The idea of living another   or   years this way seems overwhelming and fucking pointless  It feels like it would be so much easier to just stop now

text: UpdateA while back I d posted about some suicidal tendencies I was having  Everyone here helped talk me through it   I decided to hit rock bottom  A bottle of whiskey and a pack of cigs in one night  fight club  kind of a woe is me amplifier for me  and a suicide note all typed up  I took a photo and went to sleep   I woke up the next day and something clicked  I looked at the photo  I was disgusted  So I worked out and bought a book on programming  something I want to do but lacked the ambition  I cleaned the house  I applied for jobs  since I m unemployed   Overall  productive  I decided to try again the next day  Working out hurt  but the endorphins just pumped me up  I did this for a week  I gave up smoking and drinking    days into it I seemingly came out of my funk  Now    days later  I m me again  My old self  Ambition just pouring out of me  Today I bought a pack of cigs and smoked one  It was awful  representing to me everything I ve overcome  I gave the pack away   I m back  dammit  I m fucking back and it feels great  Nothing is stopping me now  I ve thrown away the suicide note   I thank every one of you for talking to me  It helped  it worked  You guys rock  For everyone struggling with the urge  I implore you to keep trying to live  Find a reason  I challenge you to  Even if you think that reason is beyond silly  Just keep at it  It DOES get better   Thanks again  everyone
